Project desc.

Register and Login

Made by using:

  • HTML
  • CSS
  • PHP
  • MySQL

Purpose

I wanted to do a practical web project with PHP. Nowdays many websites has login system, so I thought that would be good consider about a practical point of view.

DM!

Project is in Github and in its own free domain, which don't support backend, so you can only prospect the code.

If you want, you can download files for yourself and check, how the project looks like visually and test its functionality.

I didn't make real website content for this project, but enough for a user to see that register/login/logout really works.

 Github
Project desc.

International Space Station

Made by using:

  • HTML
  • CSS
  • JavaScript
  • JSON

Purpose

I wanted to learn usage of JSON and API.

API follows International space station (ISS) and displays its location at Google Maps map service.

DM!

Project is in Github and in its own free domain, which don't support backend, so you can only prospect the code.

If you want, you can download files for yourself and check, how the project looks like visually and test its functionality.

I didn't make real website content for this project, but enough for a user to see that register/login/logout really works.
